response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, we propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that make this product stand out. We believe it offers excellent value for your needs and expectations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 14000}
